snippet: A slide show from the past week in New York City and the region includes photos of a police officer’s funeral, the Indian prime minister’s Manhattan audience and the world’s largest tuba.
abstract: A slide show from the past week in New York City and the region includes photos of a police officer’s funeral, the Indian prime minister’s Manhattan audience and the world’s largest tuba.

headline.main: New York City's Week in Pictures: Oct. 3
